articles.description: Liverpool reach the Europa League last 16 as group winners with a comfortable victory over LASK at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool beat LASK to top Europa League group

articles.description: An arrest warrant is issued for Buffalo Bills linebacker Von Miller in a domestic violence case involving a pregnant woman.
articles.title: Arrest warrant issued for Buffalo Bills' Miller

articles.description: Tiger Woods shoots a three-over-par 75 as he makes his return to competitive golf in the Hero World Challenge.
articles.title: 'Rusty' Woods shoots 75 on return from injury

articles.description: Seven-time champion Ronnie O'Sullivan says he "can't be bothered any more" despite reaching the UK Championship quarter-finals.
articles.title: O’Sullivan 'can't be bothered' with snooker

articles.description: West Indies wicketkeeper Shane Dowrich announces his retirement from international cricket 10 days after a shock recall.
articles.title: Dowrich retires from West Indies duty after recall

articles.description: The Seine is due to host marathon swimming, triathlon and Paratriathlon events at the Paris 2024, but heavy rain could make that "difficult".
articles.title: Rain at Paris 2024 will make Seine events 'difficult'

articles.description: Ligue 1's bottom club Lyon sack Italian manager Fabio Grosso after just seven games in charge.
articles.title: Lyon sack Grosso after seven games in charge

articles.description: Bronny James, the son of basketball great LeBron James, is cleared to return to basketball four months after suffering cardiac arrest.
articles.title: LeBron James' son cleared to play after cardiac arrest

articles.description: Certain members of the media "need to look at themselves" for "unfair scrutiny" of Owen Farrell, says Saracens boss Mark McCall.
articles.title: Farrell treated unfairly by media - McCall

articles.description: Alex Moreno marks his injury return with the winner as Aston Villa beat Legia Warsaw 2-1 to take control of their Europa Conference League group.
articles.title: Moreno hits winner as Villa take control of group
